cards.name: Gisa, the Glorious
cards.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.description: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Swamp
cards.description: Add {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Demonic Tutor
cards.description: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand.

cards.name: Toxic Deluge
cards.description: As an additional cost to cast Toxic Deluge, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.description: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Zombify
cards.description: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Zombie Infestation
cards.description: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Blood Artist
cards.description: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Liliana's Reaver
cards.description: Whenever Liliana's Reaver attacks, defending player discards a card.

cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.description: Scry 2, then draw two cards.

cards.name: Witch's Cottage
cards.description: When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped, you may return a target creature card from your graveyard to the top of your library.

cards.name: Necromancy
cards.description: You may cast Necromancy as an instant if you pay {B} more. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Corpse Dance
cards.description: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Crypt Ghast
cards.description: Extort. Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

cards.name: Grave Titan
cards.description: Deathtouch. When Grave Titan enters the battlefield, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Liliana, the Last Hope
cards.description: Target player discards a card. Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.

cards.name: Reanimate
cards.description: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana cost.

cards.name: Tainted Pact
cards.description: Exile the top card of your library. If you do, you may put a card with the same name from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Dark Confidant
cards.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

cards.name: Vampiric Tutor
cards.description: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Bitterblossom
cards.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying. You lose 1 life.

cards.name: Liliana's Caress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Liliana's Caress deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Gravecrawler
cards.description: Gravecrawler can't block. You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a zombie.

cards.name: Undying Evil
cards.description: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, return it to the battlefield under your control instead.

cards.name: Cabal Therapy
cards.description: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

cards.name: Golgari Thug
cards.description: When Golgari Thug dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.name: Mutilate
cards.description: All creatures get -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.description: Destroy target nonblack creature.

cards.name: Black Market
cards.description: Whenever a creature dies, put a black mana token on Black Market.

cards.name: Bone Splinters
cards.description: As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Phage the Untouchable
cards.description: When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn’t cast it from your hand, you lose the game.

cards.name: Kuro, Pitlord
cards.description: Flying. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 7 life.

cards.name: Doomed Traveler
cards.description: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Carnival of Souls
cards.description: Whenever a creature dies, add {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Darksteel Pendant
cards.description: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Gorgon Recluse
cards.description: Deathtouch. When Gorgon Recluse dies, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Tainted Well
cards.description: Add {B} or {C}. If you control a Swamp, add {B}.

cards.name: Murder
cards.description: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Kuro, Pitlord
cards.description: Flying. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 7 life.

cards.name: Dark Deal
cards.description: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the number of cards they discarded this way.

cards.name: Tainted Isle
cards.description: Add {B} or {C}. If you control a Swamp, add {B}.

cards.name: Gravebreaker Lamia
cards.description: When Gravebreaker Lamia enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard.

cards.name: Necropotence
cards.description: Skip your draw step. Whenever you would draw a card, you may pay 1 life. If you do, put that card into your hand.

cards.name: Phyrexian Arena
cards.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Bitterblossom
cards.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying. You lose 1 life.

cards.name: Bloodghast
cards.description: Bloodghast can't block. Whenever Bloodghast returns to the battlefield from your graveyard, return it to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

cards.name: Erebos's Intervention
cards.description: Choose one — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn; or return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Mutilate
cards.description: All creatures get -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.description: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
